import { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const InstructionsTab = (props) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false) return (
{`${props.c.name}: Instructions`}

{ props.rid === "1" ? props.c.insn1 : props.c.insn2 }


{ props.room.length === 0 ?
: <> }
setModalOpen(false)} size="lg" centered>

{props.name}

Start new game

{props.role2}

{props.sum2}
) } export default InstructionsTab
